name: Perfectionist: The Perfect Speed Mind game
name_original: Perfectionist: The Perfect Speed Mind game
description:
Now you can play Perfectionist on your iOS device.

Fit the 25 shapes as fast as you can to beat the timer!
There is only so much time to achieve perfection, do you have the nerves?
Enjoy this fast paced,quick nerve-wracking game of eye hand coordination.

* Great graphics and exciting sound effects
* Exciting fast paced
* Nerve-wracking
* Compete with your friends for the best perfectionist time.

Perfectionist is a great way to pass the time, whether you're standing in line or spending time with the kids. Get Perfectionist now and let the fun begin!
